section.class: hero has-dark has-background-image has-texture has-left-texture is-image-home-01

div.p: Soaring Heights Charter School has been selected by the New Jersey Department of Education as a “National ESEA Distinguished School.” Because of its exceptional student performance for two consecutive years, Soaring Heights has been awarded this honor.
We're so proud to announce that Soaring Heights Charter School has been ranked the #1 "Best Public Elementary" & "Best Public Middle School" in Hudson County.
We are delighted to welcome you to the Soaring Heights Charter School website and invite you to explore more about who we are and what makes us different...
The SHCS Family shares many great moments together. From time to time we get to capture these memories and share them with you. Like and follow our FB page to keep up with what’s happening.
SHCS provides an environment of collaborative, hands on, creative and fun-filled learning through our various enrichment programs...

Through communication and calm conversations, children are encouraged to work hard, take pride in their accomplishments, develop solid study habits and acquire an appreciation for the rights and welfare of others...
We are proud to be celebrating our 20th year anniversary as the Soaring Heights Charter School...
Ranked among the Top 10% in Hudson County in NJASK Math Assessment
Ranked in top 3 in Jersey City in the NJASK Science Assessment
Ranked in the Top 3% for Best Charter Elementary Schools in the NY Metro
Ranked in the Top 2% for most diverse elementary schools in the NYC Metro

section.class: section is-medium is-alternated has-half-image has-top-deco has-secondary

div.p: The mission of Soaring Heights Charter School is to prepare a growing number of students for a lifetime of learning as productive citizens in the technological age by training them how to communicate and listen effectively…

section.class: section is-medium is-alternated has-half-image has-top-deco has-primary

div.p: At Soaring Heights we strive to make learning both fun and engaging in all subjects. Take a look at what our young scholars are up to.
A Letter from Nurse Myra
Tune in to NJTV Learning Live!
Stay up-to-date with our events, stories and important deadlines.

div.p: Soaring Heights’ budget today is the same as it was in 2008. In the meantime, the operating expenses have increased each year. The school needs your help to continue to provide a first-class education for all of its students.
Copyright © 2020 Soaring Heights Charter School. 1 Romar Ave., Jersey City, NJ 07305. Ph. 201-434-4800. All rights reserved.

a.p: Soaring Heights Charter School Facebook page

div.p: March 18, 2020
Dear Parents/Guardians,
In compliance with the Governor's mandate effective March 18, 2020, Soaring Heights Charter School will remain closed until further notice.

Distance learning is presently in progress. Daily assignments are sent to your email account, posted on Google Classroom, or Class Dojo (Kindergarten) from your child’s teacher(s). These assignments are expected to be completed and submitted daily, unless otherwise stated. Failure to do so will result in your child being marked absent for that day. Should this requirement be in conflict with other home needs, please contact your child’s teacher(s) immediately to establish another procedure.

Breakfast and lunch will be distributed daily, regardless of lunch status, at MS #40 on Gates Avenue or at the local public elementary and/or middle school closest to your home between the hours of 9:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m. Both meals will be distributed at the same time. Check the school’s website for the closest public school nearest to you.
Thank you in advance for your continued cooperation.
Be well and stay safe,
Claudia Zuorick
Director
